thread.title: DOLB expunges Wa African United's points from 2014/15 GN Bank Division One League
thread.title_full: DOLB expunges Wa African United's points from 2014/15 GN Bank Division One League

title: DOLB expunges Wa African United's points from 2014/15 GN Bank Division One League
text:
Sports News | 13 October 2015 22:42 CET DOLB expunges Wa African United's points from 2014/15 GN Bank Division One League By Ghana FA 
In accordance with Article 14(5) of the GFA General Regulations, the Division One League Board has expunged the points of Wa African United from the 2014/15 GN Bank Division One League. 
Article 14(5): “The GFA shall expunge from the competition any points and/or goals build-up in respect of matches played with a club that withdraws from the competition after the competition has started”. 
This is after the club wrote to withdraw from the 2014/15 GN Bank Division One League after the commencement of the competition. 
The DOLB's decision is however without prejudice to the decision of the Disciplinary Committee before which Wa African United are facing a charge of misconduct in accordance with Article 14(1) of the GFA General Regulations. 
Article 14(1): “It shall be misconduct for a club to withdraw from a competition after the competition has started without just cause”. 
All Clubs in Zone One of the Division One are to take note accordingly.
